tendsto_of_monotone:
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `nhds -/
theorem tendsto_of_monotone {ι α : Type _} [preorder ι] [topological_space α] [ConditionallyCompleteLinearOrder α]
    [order_topology α] {f : ι → α} (h_mono : monotone f) : tendsto f at_top at_top ∨ ∃ l, tendsto f at_top ((nhds) l) :=
  if H : BddAbove (range f) then or.inr ⟨_, tendsto_at_top_csupr h_mono H⟩
  else or.inl <| tendsto_at_top_at_top_of_monotone' h_mono H
#align tendsto_of_monotone tendsto_of_monotone
tendsto_iff_tendsto_subseq_of_monotone:
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `nhds -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `nhds -/
theorem tendsto_iff_tendsto_subseq_of_monotone {ι₁ ι₂ α : Type _} [SemilatticeSup ι₁] [preorder ι₂] [nonempty ι₁]
    [topological_space α] [ConditionallyCompleteLinearOrder α] [order_topology α] [NoMaxOrder α] {f : ι₂ → α}
    {φ : ι₁ → ι₂} {l : α} (hf : monotone f) (hg : tendsto φ at_top at_top) :
    tendsto f at_top ((nhds) l) ↔ tendsto (f ∘ φ) at_top ((nhds) l) :=
  by
  constructor <;> intro h
  · exact h.comp hg
  · rcases tendsto_of_monotone hf with (h' | ⟨l', hl'⟩)
    · exact (not_tendsto_at_top_of_tendsto_nhds h (h'.comp hg)).elim
    · rwa [tendsto_nhds_unique h (hl'.comp hg)]
#align tendsto_iff_tendsto_subseq_of_monotone tendsto_iff_tendsto_subseq_of_monotone
tendsto_at_top_supr:

/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:210:13: unsupported notation `«expr⨆ , » -/
theorem tendsto_at_top_supr (h_mono : monotone f) :
    tendsto f at_top
      ((nhds)
        («expr⨆ , » "./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:210:13: unsupported notation `«expr⨆ , »" (f i))) :=
  tendsto_at_top_csupr h_mono (OrderTop.bddAbove _)
#align tendsto_at_top_supr tendsto_at_top_supr
tendsto_at_top_is_lub:
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `nhds -/

-- see Note [lower instance priority]
-- see Note [lower instance priority]
theorem tendsto_at_top_is_lub (h_mono : monotone f) (ha : IsLUB (Set.range f) a) : tendsto f at_top ((nhds) a) :=
  by
  suffices : tendsto (range_factorization f) at_top at_top
  exact (Sup_convergence_class.tendsto_coe_at_top_is_lub _ _ ha).comp this
  exact h_mono.range_factorization.tendsto_at_top_at_top fun b => b.2.imp fun a ha => ha.ge
#align tendsto_at_top_is_lub tendsto_at_top_is_lub
tendsto_at_top_is_glb:
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `nhds -/
theorem tendsto_at_top_is_glb (h_anti : antitone f) (ha : IsGLB (Set.range f) a) : tendsto f at_top ((nhds) a) := by
  convert tendsto_at_bot_is_lub h_anti.dual ha.dual
#align tendsto_at_top_is_glb tendsto_at_top_is_glb

supr_eq_supr_subseq_of_monotone:
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr⨆ , » -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:210:13: unsupported notation `«expr⨆ , » -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr⨆ , » -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:210:13: unsupported notation `«expr⨆ , » -/
theorem supr_eq_supr_subseq_of_monotone {ι₁ ι₂ α : Type _} [preorder ι₂] [CompleteLattice α] {l : filter ι₁} [l.ne_bot]
    {f : ι₂ → α} {φ : ι₁ → ι₂} (hf : monotone f) (hφ : tendsto φ l at_top) :
    «expr⨆ , » "./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:210:13: unsupported notation `«expr⨆ , »" (f i) =
      «expr⨆ , » "./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:210:13: unsupported notation `«expr⨆ , »" (f (φ i)) :=
  le_antisymm
    (supᵢ_mono' fun i => Exists.imp (fun j (hj : i ≤ φ j) => hf hj) (hφ.eventually <| eventually_ge_at_top i).exists)
    (supᵢ_mono' fun i => ⟨φ i, le_rfl⟩)
#align supr_eq_supr_subseq_of_monotone supr_eq_supr_subseq_of_monotone
supr_eq_of_tendsto:
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `nhds -/
theorem supr_eq_of_tendsto {α β} [topological_space α] [CompleteLinearOrder α] [order_topology α] [nonempty β]
    [SemilatticeSup β] {f : β → α} {a : α} (hf : monotone f) : tendsto f at_top ((nhds) a) → supᵢ f = a :=
  tendsto_nhds_unique (tendsto_at_top_supr hf)
#align supr_eq_of_tendsto supr_eq_of_tendsto
le_of_tendsto:
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `nhds -/
theorem antitone.le_of_tendsto [topological_space α] [preorder α] [order_closed_topology α] [SemilatticeSup β]
    {f : β → α} {a : α} (hf : antitone f) (ha : tendsto f at_top ((nhds) a)) (b : β) : a ≤ f b :=
  hf.dual_right.ge_of_tendsto ha b
#align antitone.le_of_tendsto antitone.le_of_tendsto
is_lub_of_tendsto_at_top:
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `nhds -/
theorem is_lub_of_tendsto_at_top [topological_space α] [preorder α] [order_closed_topology α] [nonempty β]
    [SemilatticeSup β] {f : β → α} {a : α} (hf : monotone f) (ha : tendsto f at_top ((nhds) a)) :
    IsLUB (Set.range f) a := by
  constructor
  · rintro _ ⟨b, rfl⟩
    exact hf.ge_of_tendsto ha b
  · exact fun _ hb => le_of_tendsto' ha fun x => hb (Set.mem_range_self x)
#align is_lub_of_tendsto_at_top is_lub_of_tendsto_at_top

theorem is_lub_of_tendsto_at_bot [topological_space α] [preorder α] [order_closed_topology α] [nonempty β]
    [SemilatticeInf β] {f : β → α} {a : α} (hf : antitone f) (ha : tendsto f at_bot ((nhds) a)) :
    IsLUB (Set.range f) a :=
  @is_lub_of_tendsto_at_top α («expr ᵒᵈ» β) _ _ _ _ _ _ _ hf.dual_left ha
#align is_lub_of_tendsto_at_bot is_lub_of_tendsto_at_bot

    {f : ι₂ → α} {φ : ι₁ → ι₂} (hf : monotone f) (hφ : tendsto φ l at_bot) :
